chapter.title: Bean Dependency - wiring beans together
chapter.para: The POJO controller extends the dependency controller to provide a specific lifecycle for POJOs.

sect1.title: KernelController - wiring beans
sect1.para: The POJO controller defines the following state operations for
describe: determines the dependencies from the bean metadata
instantiate: invokes the constructor or factory
install: registers the bean with the registry

sect1.title: KernelController - demand and supply
sect1.para: The POJO controller acts as a Registry plugin to handle demand and supply.
